name: Warforged
description: Warforged are sentient constructs created for war, designed to be tireless soldiers. Over time, they developed free will and a sense of identity. Warforged are made of a blend of metal, stone, and wood, and their bodies are built for durability and combat. They are driven by a desire to understand their place in the world and often seek purpose beyond their original programming.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and one additional language of your choice.
special: Integrated Protection: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class, and you can don and doff armor as an action.
